articles.title: Destiny 2 Cheat Distributor Agrees To Pay Bungie $13.5 Million - IGN
articles.description: A company that distributed Destiny 2 cheats has agreed to pay Bungie $13.5m in damages following a lawsuit.
articles.content:
A company that develops cheat codes for Destiny 2 has agreed to pay Bungie $13.5 million in damages in a move that will end a copyright infringement lawsuit.

articles.title: Call of Duty Is Now Punishing Cheaters By Taking Away Their Weapons - IGN
